channel.title: 641 Client...HELP!
channel.description:
Hey moparscapers.. I got a 317 loading 641 source but the client is little fucked up cuz you need to put the cache in the C-Drive. I am not lzay to do that but many people dont do that or they are too lazy they just dont wanna play my rsps.. So someone got a 641 client or a client that works on Impozzes Dicing 317 loading 641?
The problem is that i need a auto-cache downloader and not manually,someone can fix or something?
